definition: escudo (Spanish and Portugese: shield), former currency of Portugal and other countries
abbr. for Egypt 埃及[Ai1 ji2]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"

sentences.english: This is a 100 dollar not I want to change it into portuguese escudo.
sentences.chinese: 我想把它換成葡萄牙埃斯庫多。
